title: Gregg Caruso on Freewill and Punishment
description: If determinism is true, can there be any justification for punishment? Gregg Caruso discusses this issue on Philosophy Bites.
content:encoded: If determinism is true, can there be any justification for punishment? Gregg Caruso discusses this issue on Philosophy Bites.
